rpc.invite: The installation URL must filled out, and also be a valid HTTPS link

bots.invite: The invite URL must be filled out, and also be a valid HTTPS link
bots.notabot: The ID provided was not a bot account.
bots.notfound: The ID provided was not found by Discord.

apps.authors: You must have at least 1 author of the application, and all Author IDs must be numeric
apps.boolean: A non-boolean value was sent to the server. Please contact Terminal.ink support.
apps.category: You must select a category for your application
apps.customisable: The customisability of the prefix must be either ticked, or unticked
apps.contents: You must select at least one language for your application page to be displayed in. Click a language, and then click "Add a language"
apps.description: The short description must have a length between 10 and 100
apps.githubowner: The GitHub owner needs to be a valid GitHub user. Leave blank if you do not have a GitHub account.
apps.githubrepo: The GitHub repository needs to be a valid string. Leave blank if you do not have a GitHub repository.
apps.id: The Application ID needs to be filled out, and numeric
apps.website: The Website URL needs to be a valid HTTPS link
apps.languages: You must add a single language. Click the language you want your application page to be in, and select the 'Add a language' button
apps.mentionable: The mentionabiliity of the prefix must be either ticked, or unticked
apps.name: The application must have a name of length between 4 and 32.
apps.nsfw: The NSFW status must be either ticked, or unticked
apps.oauth: The OAuth ID needs to be numeric
apps.page: The long description must have a length between 20 and 10000
apps.prefix: You must have at least 1 prefix, of max length 10.
apps.support: The Support URL needs to be a valid HTTPS link
apps.exists: The application already exists in the database, and you do not have permission to overwrite this.
apps.count: The guild count for a bot must be between 0 and 5000000 servers
apps.avatar: The avatar URL must be a valid HTTPS link, and a maximum of 2000 characters
apps.cover: The cover URL must be a valid HTTPS link, and a maximum of 2000 characters. Additionally, the cover URL may not be identical to the avatar URL.
apps.preview: All preview URLs must be a valid HTTPS link, and a maximum of 2000 characters each, with a maximum of 20 links
apps.no_suitable_lang: This page has no English version. '{{ language }}' is being displayed instead.
apps.youtube: The YouTube ID needs to look like an ID
apps.youku: The Alibaba YOUKU ID needs to look like an ID

permissions.denied: You do not have the adequate permissions to access this
permissions.banned: You have been denied access to this resource

reviews.rating: Please select a rating before continuing
reviews.text: Please enter why you gave this number of stars for this application.
reviews.self: You cannot review your own application!

api.400: You are unauthorised to use this endpoint. Check your token is correct.
api.404: This endpoint was not found, or the method used to request this page is not compatible.
api.test: An error was thrown for development purposes.
api.idchange: The ID of the application cannot be changed to another ID. Please contact Terminal support for technical support

website.noscript: JavaScript must be enabled to use this website effectively.

footer.foss: discordapps.dev is powered by the Terminal.ink Bot List Open Source Project
footer.apple: Apple, the Apple logo, iPhone, and iPad are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries and regions. App Store is a service mark of Apple Inc.

bots.title: Bots
bots.description: Find the perfect bot for your Discord server

rpc.title: Rich Presence Plugins
rpc.description: Show off what you are doing in Discord with RPC applications

discover.title: Discover Terminal.ink
discover.description: See how we work on improving the Terminal.ink Bot List Open Source Project

apps.oneLang: This page is only available in the following language
apps.otherLang: This page is available in other languages

index.title: Rich Presence List
index.description: Show off what you're doing, with a wide range of Discord RPC plugins for Windows, Mac or Linux software. Browse RPC and more at the Discord Apps Marketplace

index.title: Bot List
index.description: Find a Discord Bot for your server to improve your workflow, add a bit of fun or listen together with Discord Bots. Browse bots and more at the Discord Apps Marketplace

bots.reclaim: There is no author information for this bot. This may be because of loss of data between Discord_Fork and ls.terminal.ink migrations. If this is your bot, please join the Terminal.ink for reclaiming.
bots.adverts: Contains adverts and features locked behind other services
bots.count: Installed in {guilds, plural, one {a server} other {{guilds} servers}}

token.title: Token
token.description: This is the token required to edit your bot on this list. Please refer to the developer documentation for available endpoints.

hide.title: Hide bot
hide.description: You can hide your bot from the front page of the website, in case you don't need to be there.

invite.title: Installation URL
invite.placeholder: Enter a HTTPS link to your website to download your software

linux.title: Supports Linux
linux.small: What you’re referring to as Linux, is in fact, GNU/Linux, or as I’ve recently taken to calling it, GNU plus Linux.

invite.title: Invite URL
invite.placeholder: Enter a HTTPS link to invite your bot

application_id.placeholder: The ID used in the OAuth link.
application_id.title: OAuth ID

support.small: Leave this field empty if you don't like helping people

description.title: Short Descripion
description.placeholder: Enter a shorter description, shown on the home page.

github_owner.placeholder: The owner of the GitHub repository
github_owner.title: GitHub User / Organisation

github_repo.title: GitHub Repository

languages.modal: Write your application page in many supported languages. Select a language, then click the "Add a language" button to the right.

edit.leave: Are you sure you want to leave? Unmodified changes will not be saved.

name.title: Name
name.placeholder: Enter the name of the application.

page.title: Extended Description
page.placeholder: Enter useful information about your application, like commands, features and updates.

inAppPurchases.title: In App Purchases
inAppPurchases.small: Tick this box if you have features behind a paywall, such as donations

adverts.title: Advertisments
adverts.small: Tick this box if your bot links to other bot lists, and/or have features that are locked behind other services/bot lists

avatar.placeholder: A HTTPS link to an avatar image

website.placeholder: A HTTPS link to your website

edit.title: Add or Edit an Application
edit.updates: It is highly recommended you join the Terminal.ink Discord Server to view service updates, view your application verification status, and also recieve direct messages from staff about your application.

error.report: Thanks for taking the time to report this error. Please type in what you were doing before the incident.
error.snarky: This error was going to happen anyway.

list.empty: There are no applications which matches the current filter.

locale.pleasehelp: Are you a good translator? Click here.

reviews.placeholder: Please enter a reason for your review.

game.description: Click the button to get points!

docs.title: Terminal.ink Documentation and Blogs
docs.description: See posts about how Terminal.ink operates, or see a tutorial on how to do something.

pagination.reviews: User reviews for '{{ name }}' - Page { number }

site.name: Discord Apps Marketplace
site.subheading: Find bots to enhance your server
site.description: discordapps.dev is an application store for Discord applications. Install bots for music, news, moderation and more for your server, or install RPC plugins to show off what you're doing.

innovate.heading: Start Innovating
innovate.content: Learn to create your own Discord application for your own personal server

add.heading: Add your app
add.content: Share your creation to the world; Let others enhance their server experience with your applications

helpusimprove.title: Help us
helpusimprove.text: Please comment with feedback on this website via the issues tab on GitHub.
